DOC.brief_summary: Objective : L- [ 3-18F ] -α–methyltyrosine ( FMT ) amino-acid tracer PET . We evaluate diagnostic usefulness 18F-FMT PET non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) patient . Tumor uptake 18F-FMT PET compare 18F-FDG PET correlation L-type amino acid transporter 1 ( LAT1 ) expression also investigate . Method : Fifty patient NSCLC enrol study , pair PET study 18F-FMT 18F-FDG performed . LAT1 expression Ki-67 labeling index resect tumor analyze immunohistochemical study .
DOC.brief_title: Fluorine-18-α–Methyltyrosine Positron Emission Tomography Diagnosis Staging Lung Cancer
